languages.text: "Я давно уже научилась различать саркастичные нотки в говоре людей, {name}. Но ты прав{mf||а} — выбора у тебя действительно нет".
"I learned to pick out the sarcastic notes in human speech long ago, {name}. But you are right — you really do not have a choice."
languages.original_text: "Я давно уже научилась различать саркастичные нотки в говоре людей, {name}. Но ты прав{mf||а} — выбора у тебя действительно нет".

traits.locale_text: "I have learned to pick out the sarcastic notes in human speech long ago, {name}. But you're right — you really don't have a choice."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have learned to pick out the sarcastic notes in human speech long ago, {name}. But you're right — you really don't have a choice."

traits.locale_text: "I learned to pick out the sarcastic notes in human speech long ago, {name}. But you are right — you really do not have a choice."

languages.text: “我已经学会了如何辨别人类的冷嘲热讽，{name}。不过你说对了，你确实别无选择。”
languages.original_text: "I learned to pick out the sarcastic notes in human speech long ago, {name}. But you are right — you really do not have a choice."

traits.locale_text: “我已经学会了如何辨别人类的冷嘲热讽，{name}。不过你说对了，你确实别无选择。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Hace mucho tiempo que aprendí a detectar el sarcasmo en la forma de hablar de los humanos, {name}. Pero tienes razón: no tienes alternativa».
languages.original_text: "I learned to pick out the sarcastic notes in human speech long ago, {name}. But you are right — you really do not have a choice."

traits.locale_text: «Hace mucho tiempo que aprendí a detectar el sarcasmo en la forma de hablar de los humanos, {name}. Pero tienes razón: no tienes alternativa».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai appris à percevoir le sarcasme dans le discours humain depuis bien longtemps, {name}. Mais vous avez raison : je ne vous laisse pas le choix. »
languages.original_text: "I learned to pick out the sarcastic notes in human speech long ago, {name}. But you are right — you really do not have a choice."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai appris à percevoir le sarcasme dans le discours humain depuis bien longtemps, {name}. Mais vous avez raison : je ne vous laisse pas le choix. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich höre sarkastische Untertöne in den Worten von Menschen schon lange heraus, {name}. Aber Ihr habt recht – Eure Meinung zählt wirklich nicht."
languages.original_text: "I learned to pick out the sarcastic notes in human speech long ago, {name}. But you are right — you really do not have a choice."

traits.locale_text: "Ich höre sarkastische Untertöne in den Worten von Menschen schon lange heraus, {name}. Aber Ihr habt recht – Eure Meinung zählt wirklich nicht.
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「人間の話し言葉から皮肉を聞き分ける方法はずいぶん前に学んだよ、{name}。だが、お前の言うとおり…本当に選択の余地はないのだな」
languages.original_text: "I learned to pick out the sarcastic notes in human speech long ago, {name}. But you are right — you really do not have a choice."

traits.locale_text: 「人間の話し言葉から皮肉を聞き分ける方法はずいぶん前に学んだよ、{name}。だが、お前の言うとおり…本当に選択の余地はないのだな」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "I learned to pick out the sarcastic notes in human speech long ago, . But you are right — you really do not have a choice."

languages.text: "İnsan konuşmalarındaki iğneleyici tınıları ayırt etmeyi uzun zaman önce öğrendim {name}. Fakat haklısın, başka bir seçeneğin yok."
languages.original_text: "I learned to pick out the sarcastic notes in human speech long ago, {name}. But you are right — you really do not have a choice."

traits.locale_text: "İnsan konuşmalarındaki iğneleyici tınıları ayırt etmeyi uzun zaman önce öğrendim {name}. Fakat haklısın, başka bir seçeneğin yok."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
